OWNER_SHIP_TITLE1: We securely manage your ownership with blockchain technology
OWNER_SHIP_TITLE2: Joint-ownership is recorded on the “Icon Broof” blockchain system.
OWNER_SHIP_TITLE3: As records are made on thousands of computers concurrently, counterfeiting and falsification of the ownership is not possible.
OWNER_SHIP_TITLE4: You can check the joint-ownership of each work through the company’s website and the online certification sent individually.
OWNER_SHIP_TITLE5: Click ‘Check’ button(Manage Joint-Ownership), you can check the co-owners of each work
OWNER_SHIP_TABLE_CONTENT: You can check it through  Icon Broof
PURCHASE_SUMMARY_TITLE: Progress of consignment sale for artworks
PURCHASE_SUMMARY_SUB_TITLE: Check the progress of consignment sale of ArtnGuide joint-purchase works!

SALE_GUIDE_SUB_TITLE: With ArtnGuide (www.artnguide.co.kr), enjoy the special experience of owning famous artists’ works for a small amount
SALE_GUIDE_STEP1A: Open through website, e-mail, and Instagram
SALE_GUIDE_STEP2A: Open at 10:00 A.M. on the day of joint-purchase
SALE_GUIDE_STEP3: End of joint-purchase and confirmation of ownership
SALE_GUIDE_STEP3A: After 20 days from the date of joint-purchase, ownership recorded on the blockchain
SALE_GUIDE_STEP3B: *The end of joint-purchase process and the end time of the joint-purchase can be different.
SALE_GUIDE_STEP4A: For those who request we send you confirmation of artwork within 3 weeks after the end of joint-purchase
SALE_GUIDE_STEP5A: In case of consignment sale is done, we distribute payment to blockchain record owners
SALE_GUIDE_CONTENT: All joint-purchases can be made after membership registration.
SALE_GUIDE_CONTENT1: You can receive news of various events more quickly by adding ‘ArtnGuide’ KakaoTalk Plus as Friend.
SALE_GUIDE_BOTTOM_CONTENT: Not a member of ArtnGuide yet?
FOOTER_COMPANY_TITLE2A: ChungCheongnam-do, Republic of Korea 06182, 407, Yeongdong-daero, Gangnam-gu, Seoul
HOME_ABOUT_TEXT: Korea's first joint purchase platform for you to own the works of famous artists for a small price
HOME_ABOUT_TEXT1: The works of famous artists amount to tens or hundreds of billions of won.
HOME_ABOUT_TEXT2: Expensive works were reserved for the rich, and public participation was impossible.
HOME_ABOUT_TEXT3: In October 2018, ArtnGuide proposed a joint purchase of artworks for the first time in Korea by dividing and sharing ownership of works in units of 10,000 won.
HOME_ABOUT_TEXT4: Please enjoy the experience of collecting artworks by famous domestic artists such as Kim Whanki, Lee Jungseop, Lee Ufan, and Park Seobo, as well as works by famous foreign artists such as David Hockney, Pablo Picasso, and Yayoi Kusama.
HOME_READ_MORE_TEXT1: Learn more about the ArtnGuide joint-purchase process
HOME_READ_MORE_TEXT2: That even first-time visitors can proceed easily!
